name: Yoshimasa Nakamura
content: Yoshimasa NAKAMURA [ English | Japanese ] Home Page of Yoshimasa NAKAMURA Date of Birth and Nationality October 9th, 1955, Japanese Degrees Master degree, 1980, Kyoto University Ph.D degree, 1983, Kyoto University Research and Professional Experiences Postdoctorial Fellow of Japan Society for Promotion of Science, 1983-84 Research Associate at Department of Mathematics, Gifu University, 1984-86 Associate Professor at Department of Mathematics, Gifu University, 1986-93 Associate Professor at Department of Electronics, Doshisha University, 1993-94 Professor at Department of Electronics, Doshisha University, 1994-96 Professor at Department of Informatics and Mathematical Science, Osaka University, 1996-2001 Professor at Department of Applied Mathematics and Physics, Kyoto University, 2001+ Research Subjects "Applied Integrable Systems" -Methods of Integrable Systems- Recent Works (1995+) Address Postal: Department of Applied Mathematics and Physics Graduate School of Informatics Kyoto University, Kyoto 606-8501, Japan Email: Phone and Fax: International+81+75+753+5497 Back Last Modified: 2005/05/07
